author: Cesar Gonzalez
comment: @Joto Zoldyck I do understand, but if I am truly being honest, I can not be demanding or picky for that matter. I'm not someone who watches anime series for many reasons but the specific one is that the fight scenes in other animes are super unnecessarily prolonged for drama effects and that is just annoying. So the only ones I watch are Baki, Banana Fish and Kengan cause they go directly to the story telling ESPECIALLY with the fights, and they don't BS with fillers or overly dramatic crap. The music in these shows is also great. And if I find some random youtuber who puts these vids together with great music so far in each (to my taste of course) I accept it and enjoy. It is like an ace in the hole without even knowing you'd get it. So its ace for me ğŸ˜‚ no complaints from these videos Fidus is dishing out hahahahhahahaahahaha
